content.detailedDescription: Hanging out on my back deck talking to my father on the phone when i saw it flying south coming from the north. was for sure a mechanical object shaped like a cigar with a bend in middle. i quickly pointed it out to my roomate and we watched it for a few seconds and it was gone south over green mountain. saw one last night as well. this one had faint lights and was headed west. looked like a flying w or something. weve been seeing these crazy things for 3 years now. i dont have enough time or patience to fill out a report everytime we see them. the last 2 years we saw boomerangs but this year its been these strange shaped objects. they dont look like they should be able to fly.
content.summary: A large cigar shaped thing with a slight bend in the middle flew over kinda sideways in a straight line? fast silent

content.detailedDescription: Was going over hiking photos when i got home and found this in the sky in one photo.  didn't see it at the time i took the photo. i was on the lake blanche trail looking nw, i think.
content.summary: Found in hiking photos after the fact.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to rowland high for coach norm revis memorial i was looking up 1 passing a mine i dug in the riverside mountains off the 60 fwy.
 when i saw three white spheres one bigger one two smaller ones. the bigger sphere was sitting still hovering while two fly around the bigger one , they all came together as one and started to fly away as this was happening i had my video camera going, it got 2 seconds and it cut off for no reason? , i got out of the car and continued video taping cause i did not know it was cut off ??? why?? but i got a photo of it as it flew by it was one craft now not three, they morphed into one i am not kidding !!!!! into what looked like a disc, it was as real as anything i have ever seen and it was not i repeat was not a drone, it was as big as a suv. i managed to get a little footage just enough to see it was there not a hoax...Folks i just wish they would have not messed with my camera ..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White spheres morph into one after they flew aroung the bigger white sphere then fly away in a striat line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my garden making photos
when i saw the pictures on my computer
i have no idea
glowing sphere with some windows maybe or lights
i did not see the object until i saw the photos
with the sun
content.summary: Glowing sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a picture of some new skyscraper in the area, then suddenly this disc like ufo appared over the city and moved very fast. it made sharp turns and was extremely fast. i thought i had to take a picture of it so i did. i took about 10-15 photos, but only one came out non blurry, as the object was stationary at that time. after this it shot up into the sky and disappeared.
content.summary: Disc like object moved very fast above the city and shot up straight then disappeared.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
between 21 00 to 21 32, on 12-10-2015 in hamburg, germany, looking to the south between the stars altair and vega, me and my wife saw what looked like 3 stars traveling like 10 meters on the sky. 
  it started very bright and while it were traveling the light was fading, the sky was very clear, no clouds at all, didnt look like an aeroplane(i would know if it was) and it came, the first one at like 21 oclock, 10 minutes after, came the second one and around 10 minutes after the third one. always starting very bright and the light fading, didnt look like a comet, like burning gases but just a ball of light fading while moving. didnt change the direction just moved straight.
content.summary: Between 21 00 to 21 32, me and my wife saw what looked like 3 stars travelling like 10 meters on the sky, it started very bright and while it were travelling the light was fading, the sky was very bright, no clouds at all didnt look lik aeroplane and

content.detailedDescription: Went out to car to go pick up food, saw bright flash in nw sky near handle of big dipper.  waited to see if happened again and another slow strobe motivated to get my partner out to see also.  she and i observed some kind of object take approx 15 minutes to cover about half of the sky from nw to ne before it seemed to go behind some clouds.  i was unable to capture very long video, but did capture the light for a couple seconds.  we saw it strobe about 5 or six times with some other really bright random flashes. def not nav lights.  through binocs it looked like a very dim satellite, but i cannot recall ever seeing one move that slow or flash anywhere near that bright.  someone else saw a similar object on same night out by north platte, so i figured i would also post our story even though nothing can be concluded other than it was a very mysterious, slow-moving object that pulsed about every 30 seconds or so.
content.summary: Pulsating and randomly flashing high altitude object

content.detailedDescription:
Mufon:

on friday, october 9, 2015, at approximately 1400 hours while pruning my residential pine tree in the village of saint albans, borough of queens, nyc, i looked up into a clear blue sky and saw this object traveling from west to east at approximately 50 miles per hour at 17,000 feet.  it was not a plane and there were no clouds in the sky on this clear blue day.   my i phone 6 did not have zoom video so i had to photograph it.  in the first photo just above the pine tree branch, you can see a tiny white dot.  the second photo is the same as the first but zoomed in.  if you look carefully, the ufo is in two parts.  the first and leading part resembles that of a fish tail and the second trailing part is somewhat rounded. the parts were connected as it traveled across the sky in a straight and unwaivering line before it dissappeared.  can someone explain this or contact someone who may be able to.  i reside between laguardia and kennedy airports and i believe this requires the utmost attention.  my vision is a clear 15/20 and i have been a pilot since 1981.  please examine the evidence and evaluate this claim.
content.summary: Transparent fishtail leading and connected to a circlular object

content.detailedDescription:
Walking my dog near home at approx 11am on 10/9/15 on hot 90 degree "santa ana" day here in south carlsbad, ca. and saw a bright white star looking object flying from my left to right (north to southwest) at est. speed of 75-150mph(?) i thought is was a small plane but as it was directly in front/almost above me "it" was still perfectly round, no noise, thought maybe a white balloon but seemed oddly bright and no shadowing so grabbed iphone5s and took 5 pics as it crossed my path above. tried to zoom in on last pic with camera. it started going to the south and about to be blocked out by a house/tree's. being a fan of steven greer's work i thought i'd "concentrate on communicating to it" by asking "it" to stop, come back and do something/anything that a plane could not do". i was honestly somewhat entertaining myself by doing this but then was shocked as it immediately stopped, reversed course in straight line just a short distance then stopped, made 90 degree turn to right then back to center then 90 degree turn to my left then back to being on original centered flight path and continued on it's southwest course.............I realize sightings are common and may not have even bothered to send this in but was quite amazed/shocked/somewhat intimidated when it first reversed course towards me, so because of that oddity i felt compelled that this was a true sighting and had made some sort of communication with it. i felt like it was simply "acknowledging me". just as it finished it's manuevers a jogger came by and inquired as to what i was looking at. i pointed it out to this female jogger and she asked me "wow, what is that"?  i felt funny in telling her what i thought so asked her what she thought it was! i then admitted to having studied ufology intensely since 2013 and had seen another ufo in this same area on 7/18/13 (cylindrical, hovering at 35 degree angle for 10 minutes in broad daylight around 2;30pm about 2 football fields away in distance and about 10 stories high in height, size hard to guess) and told her what just happened along with my prior same area sighting............She was somewhat shocked and stared at it as it flew further away and went out of sight. i do not know who this lady was that saw it hover then continue it's flight.
i am submitting the 5 pics taken and am looking forward to mufon's opinion if they have equipment to clean up the "pixelation effect" from this 5 megapixal iphone camera and to hear opinion on the darker ring around it that can be seen upon enlarging the photo's on the computer.
i only wished that i had used the video clip option instead of the camera but did not expect it to stop and do what it did! 
this makes my second sighting of which i never thought i'd see one again after the sighting 2 years ago. ***just a note of interest. i have one "experiencer event" circa 1993-94 of which i have not reported to mufon but only a few close friends and family. i have some of the classic scars and health issues, ie; scoop marks on both legs front and back, one white triangle on upper left fore arm and suffer from extreme anxiety issues for unknown reasons, fatigue, memory issues to boot. also now realize that i had hundreds of strange dreams years ago about being chased at night in my bedroom and always by my younger brother (now realize "screen memories" used on me(?)) other family events that never made sense until i studied ufology now many of these events make sense and seem possibly part of a generational abduction scenario.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like bright star flying by, but stopped when i "asked it to"

content.detailedDescription:
At around 0230 on the night of 10-10-15  in the city of ventura california  i  noticed a very bright light in the sky,  much brighter than any star i have ever seen.  i believe it was oriented south east.  the  object in question appeared to be glowing/ pulsating light that would change color form light blue to dark blue to violet and  purple. after watching it for some time i woke up my mother who  brought out binoculars to observe the object. 

upon looking at the  object with magnification  i got a very uneasy feeling. the  object p.M. moving in the sky from left to right then up and down,  always moving i'm straight lines and always returning to center. when looking at the object with binoculars i noticed that the object would change shapes and sizes. the lights also looked much different.  instead of being a single color i noticed all the colors were  present at once with the one being the dominant color. 

i did my due diligence researching what it c i did my due diligence researching what it could have been which brought me to the dog star. although there were similarities what i saw was much more vibrant and moved differently then the dog star. i was able to get some video as well as pictures on my ipad.  being they are short on quality is not very high. i can say this that  normally my ipad is hard-pressed to be able to take a picture of the moon lot alone stars 
because it's not very good at picking up light.  however i was able to see it with my ipad. 

 the object stayed in the south eastern sky tell sunrise (0600). both my mother ( whose dad was an engineer for lockheed martin and grew up  around experiment aircraft) both said that we had never seen anything like it before and it was a sight to behold.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: pulsating light southern california

content.detailedDescription: I had just dropped a friend off at her house after leaving a mutual friends house at about 2am. i was not under the influence of any mind altering drugs or alcohol. i had just started to drive to my house when i saw a yellowish white light that looked like a bright shooting star shoot through the air. it was so far above me i could not tell you the size or any distinguishing features. it was heading towards three mile island (a nuclear power plant near where i live) when it suddenly pulled a u-turn like maneuver and spead off in another direction. the whole sighting was just a few seconds. i have seen very similar things before, about 3 sightings counting this one. although the prior signtings i had others with me who also witnessed the ufo sightings.
content.summary: I saw a yellowish white light shoot through the sky like a bright shooting star but it made a rather sharp u-turn and spead off in a different direction

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out my door to get my kids to get off bible school bus, i looked up because it was very clear out, and have seen objects in sky for multiple days, saw a blinking hovering object, then it started to move very slow, then stopped again and hovered, i tried to take a picture but it blinked and didnt show up, so took another pic before it took off and got a nice pic of object while it was fully view able
content.summary: Waiting for kids from.Church, looked above mailboxes, and saw blinking object hovering, then moving slowly then hovered then took off

content.detailedDescription: Hi. i would first off like to thank mufon and let you guys know that as a fellow scientist getting himself through college, i commend your bravery in pursuing that truth which is on the fringe of the area that can make persuing that truth a dangerous endeavor. let me also tell you that i 100 % understand some of the reasons there are for persuing this truth. i have seen objects in the sky, always at night, that i cannot just quickly explain away as a plane or helicopter. with the view of the sky in my yard i have quite an impressive span of space to observe. but, for some reason i see more towards the airport which is towards the southeast from my house. of course yes i see planes and of course i have seen a plane that i thought may have been a ufo when the plane is coming head on towards me. this gives the illusion of the object hovering. but of course planes will normally reveal themselves as planes. but there are the lights that i observe that actually do just hover in the southeast moving left to right and right to left in the sky. i have watched brightly lit objects on several occasions in this area of the sky slowly make there way around the sky going higher, lower, left, right. zigzagging all around. my interest in ufos peaked about a year and a half ago due to an increased number of sightings. at the connecticut river fishing with my friend over the opposite side of the river both of us observed a brightly lit white light object make its way closer to the river. when the object appeared to be closer to the trees a smaller red object floated from what appeared to be out of the trees to meet the white object. after a few minutes the objects separated and the red one went back down and the white back up. the white object continued to hover and would go out of view and then would just reappear where it began. the same thing took place one more time before we left for the night. now of course i do not know if this was aliens but i find it very hard to believe that the government were flying some hovercraft that did not make any noise directly over the city of springfield and refueling it mid air with some smaller red object again over the city of springfield. aliens or not this kicked off me paying even closer attention to the sky. the event that this report is based upon comes next. there are normally lights in the sky that i cannot put a 100% identification on but i can almost always tell myself oh it could have been a plane or helicopter or something that could have been it. well the event that this report is about could not be explained by me. i was out back on my deck looking into the sky as i do many nights at around ten o clock when i noticed in the sky due southeast a very orange,bright, burning ball of flame. the ball burned in the night sky as if it were just that, a round ball of fire, for what now seems as if it would have been maybe two minutes. at the end of this time the ball of fire very very abruptly ceased.Not even a second later, from the very same spot a blue streak shot into the air, straight up and away from earth. when burning the object seemed to be high but not so far away that i would not be able to hear an engine of that size. the fireball could have not been more than a mile away in the sky though i did not hear a thing even when it disappeared for a split second turned blue and shot straight into space. now is this aliens or was this something being tested by the military? i do not know i only know what it is i saw and that i do not know of a vehicle we fly that does the things i saw other than some type of spacecraft or rocket. just because i do not know of it doesn't mean it's not humans but whatever i saw was certainly strange. again it began as a large round burning fireball and in a split second the flame stopped and from the exact same spot a blue streak shot into space. it seemed to me as if this burning. fireball was building up energy and when enough was made to do what was needed to be done it stopped burning and shot into space. i guess the strangest part of the object was how it was stationary and seemed to be a burning ball of gas for at least two minutes before it shot through the atmosphere as a blue streak. whether it is humans a natural phenomena or aliens experiences like this are important and are a key part of humans as a species progressing. no matter which way you look at it there are just simply many many more parts of our universe than earth an many many more things for us to learn. i have never been abducted and have never seen a physical alien but i do not appreciate when people are not taken seriously when they talk about extra terrestrials. there are things i've seen that cannot be simply explained away and i know that there are people out there who know far more than me about it but there is some fear of alerting the general public that i actually understand almost completely. who knows what types of fears would take over the typical human mind when it is known that we are not alone. i am hopeful for it but not everyone is. i feel the human race is very close now to positively identifying life off of earth. my astronomy professor now is actually allowed to say that there really probably is life in space. if a college can say that than we must be getting close and ya know what with everything being seen in the sky lately by others and by myself it really is not much of a surprise to me at all. the only bad feeling i get from possible alien life is the possibility that people could screw up contact so bad.
content.summary: Have seen others, most lasting impression from this. bright orange ball of flame in sky southeast. disappeared in split second to reappear split second later to turn blue and shoot straight up into sky.Never saw it again, unless it is the same as others

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:00 pm, on oct. 10th, 2015, my boyfriend and i were looking up at the night sky in moorpark, ca. 

we observed the stars and the usual flight patterns of airplanes and other small aircraft. 

suddenly a v-shaped (or boomerang shaped object) appeared above us, slightly north, heading east in the sky, then quickly disappeared. 

when first observed, thought it was a white owl or even a night hang glider. but in the last second, new this was not either of these.

it seemed very large, dimly lit, and almost transparent with 4-5 lights on each side.
it appeared ghostly, as it did not make a sound, while gliding at a moderate speed. i witnessed this for 3 seconds, and my boyfriend saw this for 2 seconds. 

neither of us has witnessed anything like this before. i felt privileged to have seen something so foreign and other worldly. but had to keep checking in with each other to make sure this was not a dream, or crazy, and that we in fact saw something we may never understand.

lost sight of it through a palm tree, and never reappeared.
content.summary: Large, dimly lit, almost transparent object gliding through moorpark night sky

content.detailedDescription: Cloud would dissipate and another would form the same spot.After watching this reoccur several times i observed with 50x binoculars and saw that a small moving black dot was the source of each new formation.  it moved around a bit but stayed in  one general area west of my location and over delaware county,pa.  planes landing at philadelphia international  were much closer so distance was several miles away.  this went on for about twenty minutes until dusk. total clear sky, then cloud, then clears up, then another starts forming around moving black craft ( note: since i faced the setting sun, both cloud and craft were silhouetted). as clouds formed they drifted south but the new ones always formed in a single area that didn't change. no other cloud formations in entire sky but this one.This cycle repeated itself about a dozen times until darkness fell. i have never observed this sort of aerial activity before and wonder if anyone else has.
content.summary: Observed small lone cloud in western sky on otherwise totally clear conditions.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my 13-yr old granddaughter, heading home after dropping grandson at a friend's house. as we came to the intersection, i noticed several bright orange orbs in the sky, approaching from the west. i asked her if she saw what i saw, and asked her to describe what she was seeing. she saw the same things i saw. i stopped the car at the stop sign & got out. there was no sound from the objects. they were travelling in a loose formation, all at the same rather slow speed. there was sky and stars visible between the objects, so they did not appear to be connected. as they came right over us, one by one, they disappeared.
content.summary: A formation of orange orbs travelling together from west to east in the clear, starry sky.

content.detailedDescription:
While watching tv live show cricket from my home i observed this object passed by indian flag at kanpur cricket stadium india travelling at the speed of light.

when rewinded and observed in slow motion still that object appears travelled at the speed of light. the camera was almost still.
content.summary: Sphere shaped brightened object

content.detailedDescription: My husband & i were in rockefeller center sitting on a bench facing south. i was looking up at the sky above the building directly across the street from the ice rink. the night sky was black above this building. then out of nowhere, to the left of the building, way up above us i saw what looked like a star. it was a little round light. at first i thought it was a helicopter. the object flew over the building way above it and then started to fly erratically, darting from side to side almost as if were jumping back and forth. then it disappeared. there was nothing in the airspace. there is consistent lighting in the area and there was continued darkness above. this was the only thing in the sky. i have seen a lot of planes and helicopters before but this was nothing like that. there is no way anyone could fly an object and all of a sudden start jumping around side to side in an erratic flight pattern. it could not have been a falling or shooting star because this did not have a clear straight pattern. i would also like to add that this object appeared out of nowhere and disappeared in a span before the building and after. it did not come from behind a building.
content.summary: In rockefeller center looking up saw a round light cross sky erratically then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: From back deck.This was between the north side of holland and zeeland.  saw red spiratic flames to the north and white light from a beam but sometimes flash to the south..  but they would go out but jump around.  went upstairs.  saw long or possibly round glowing yellowish lights inside a outlined same colored short but long wall.  up in the sky there was a darker area than the rest of the sky like a dark cloud or smoke going up.  it's still there.  it's been there for over an hour.  i check the sky every night.  never saw lights there to the west ever before. i hope someone else reports this. i was just thinking what in the world?  this was like nothing i had ever seen beforei had to get to bed.  too dark i guess.  camera couldn't pick t up very well.
content.summary: Red spiratic flames on ground. from second floor saw round wall / windows

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to take my son to his mothers house in kelsyville from hidden valley. at exactly 8:20 pm i noticed a reddish, organge  glowing ball flying through the sky between 3 to 5 k miles per hour, i thought , omg a ufo!! and i kept my eyes on the sky and 2 more followed. same speed, same height, and same distance apart.This happened on my  grandmothers
 birthday on 2-18-13. they traveled from one mountain side to the other within 3 seconds!
i thought that it was very cool to see that, and it is still stuck in my head. they just disappeared. i think my boy was asleep.
content.summary: 3 ufo's passing thru, same height, same distance apart,same speed, same color, exactly, 3 seconds apart, everything was perfectly the same.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to take my son to school and we stop at a stop sign and looked up and in the distance i seen something shinning in the sky so i took my phone out and took a photo did not know what it was untill i got home and seen something that should not be in the photo but i see them almost every night from my back yard .But i think its cool .
content.summary: Takeing son to school and seen something shinning in the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was the night of the lunar eclipse. i was going out side about every 15 to 20 minutes with my camera to hopefully get a few good pictures of the eclipse. i went out at 9:00pm and could barely see the moon, it was still rising to where i could see it well. i saw a light move quickly from the south to the north following the horizon arc like the space station does when it passes. i thought maybe it was a satellite.  then about 9:30pm i went out again and looked up and to the east, saw the moon had risen more, i snapped a picture, looked up and snapped another picture. i went back inside and went to bed. last evening, my husband and i viewed the pictures and there was an unusual glowing object in the first picture. it's not in t he second picture taken moments later. we zoomed in on it and we're not sure what it is. i don't know if the camera flashed or not when i took the pictures, i thought i had the flash turned off.  thanks.
content.summary: Was checking eclipse, had camera, saw unusual light and snapped picture

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting in our back yard. we always look at the sky as we have dfw airport about 8 miles away. my wife noticed a glowing object rising from the south. at first i thought it was a plane or helicopter but as it got closer it was moving way too fast for either. we watched it as it moved north and went to the front yard, where we saw 3 more rise from behind the house. we went to the back yard as it was less light and tried to film them with my ipad, which we did get a few good shots of them. they moved in basically a straight line but blinked the smaller ones faster than the larger ones. as we watched before they all passed over, what i would describe as a fleet rose from the south, about 8-10, some moving faster than others. we have seen many things in the night sky but glowing blueish green orbs are a first, we do have several on video.
content.summary: Multiple objects on same flight path

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready for work and feeding the bluejays i looked up there. i grabbed my camera which has very good quality pictues, loaqed the sd card on my laptop and wow.
content.summary: Looked like shiny kites but but too big too high

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were vacationing at big bend national park in texas.We arrived on the 22 of sept.. it was are first time visiting the park.We hiked took in the beauty of the park and the sky was big and impressive.My wife and i spent a night in marfa tx.In hopes of seeing the marfa lights it was a rainy night and we were told not to bother.I guess i was all ready primed an hopeful.I had a pair of night vision binoculars my wife got me on-line.We hiked the first day then took it easy the next.We walked down to one of the observation points which overlooked what they call the window looking west.We were taking in the half moon night with clear visibility our heads tilted back on the observation bench we were sitting on my wife says hey look at that.I looked over to where she was looking and was speechless.I told her ugh stars don't move.We both watched this i think craft move across the sky north to south in about a minutes time.It did a what i would call a zig-zag before it went out of sight.20 minutes later it came back what appeared at an even higher altitude traveling south to north.I don't no if it was the same or possibly a second.We never saw two together.There was another observation point maybe 50 yards south of us they had some type of night vision film equip i heard them say out loud did you see that.I only wish i had talked to them.Well that's my story i felt compelled to tell you. i am an ardent believer.I i could think after-ward was stars that are light years away don't suddenly start moving.I kept thinking this thing must be huge.Really if you think about it there's no explanation.Thanks mufon for listening.  your friend tim clift.
content.summary: Star lite brilliance moving north to south literally at star height looking straight up.

content.detailedDescription: Three witnesses, my sister in law, my wife, and i. it seriuosly looked like a flying campfire. changed direction to the south, started to fade after the turn. moved rather quickly. silent but moved across the sky at about the same speed the international space station would. i saw it first and felt like it was about a quarter mile away, wife and sister got up to walk out on the porch and it seem to turn south. it started to dim then move quickly away. moved behind a tree (our view blocked) moved to the right and pick it up again, now probably several miles away, faded into the low horizon. fyi dmafb is to my south but this thing went beyond the base toward the airport. plane on fire?
content.summary: Looked like a campfire floating in the sky. changed direction

content.detailedDescription: Family driving home on interstate 70 east when my youngest sonspotted a cluster of about 6-8 red lights in the sky south of 70. we exited 70 on exit 112, making a left and pulling into the shopping center parking lot to observe and take pictures. by the time we found a parking spot behind the shopping center several of the lights had disappeared. they appeared to be ascending slowly into the atmosphere, and dimming the higher they went. my son was in a panic and crying, but we were able to hear far off sounds, like cannon fire, while watching these lights. you can see the lights and hear the booms in the video provided. the lights appear white in the video but they were red. the whole thing lasted about 15 minutes from the time we first spotted them from the freeway. not sure how long they were there before we saw them. they were definately about 500 feet or so off the ground when we first saw them, and slowly rising up. there were several airplanes in our area during this event, and all of them seemed to be flying towards where we had seen the lights. after the lights disappeared we noticed 3 different helicopters circling downtown columbus, as well as a large search light from the center of downtown pointed in the direction we had seen the lights.
content.summary: Cluster of red lights ascending into sky and disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south in my vehicle on seymour rd in montrose, mi, between lake rd and the montrose orchard. around 8:50 pm est+- 2 minutes. to my south west, i saw the underside and outline of a circular disc like object nearly overhead. the disc was dull colored, barely reflecting the ambient light in the night sky, the object had a very faint pinkish glow around it , it was traveling i would estimate 60-70 mph west for approximately 1-2 seconds then darted off at an extremely high rate of speed to the south west out of sight. approximately 3-5 seconds later i saw a 2nd object exactly like the first, traveling in the same manner and flight path as the 1st object. then 15-25 seconds later, i spotted a 3rd object 1000 -1500 yards more southerly, exactly like the 1st and 2nd traveling very close/ parallel to the 1st and 2nd objects flight path. all objects were observed from my vehicle, i was traveling approximately 45 mph in a southward direction.  i would estimate the craft to be roughly 100-200' in diameter. i was extremely excited/ shocked to see this sort of event. i have never seen anything remotely close to this in the 30 years of my life. i just continued traveling south on seymour rd. another quarter mile, then turned into riverside market.
content.summary: Circular object spotted north east overhead traveling around 50 mph darted southwest and out of sight, dull bluish glow around disclike object

content.detailedDescription: My room mate noticed them first and told me to come look at these lights...  i stepped out onto front porch and frum about 20 degrees to 45 degrees throughout the incident there were as many as 6 and none then several in out...  they made short fast darting motions at least 3 times faster than ive ever seen any plane/chopper lights...  one finally flared what appeaered to be a rocket blasting off but going in the wrong direction frum the plumes direction should have been...  then in about a minute some dimmed out and sum just went out...  i have only ever seen lights these on ufo documentaries that people were able video record...
content.summary: I seen unusual lights

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from dinner with my two sons, as i neared my house, i noticed a solid bright red light approaching from the south.  i pulled into my driveway, immediately go out of my van and observed the light continue to approach from the south in a n-ne direction.  the light was solid. this was not airplane navigation lights.  i've seen thousands, maybe tens of thousand of navigation lights and anti-collision lights, no blinking or strobe-ing at all - this was completely solid and unusually bright.

i observed the light for approximately one minute, during which one of my sons exited the van, joined me and also observed the light.

as it approached, it faded out.  i continued to scan the sky and listen for the sound of a prop plane or jet engine for approximately 5 more minutes and heard nothing.

this is the third time i have witnessed a similar event.  the two previous times the light was traveling west to east, was solid red and disappeared as it approached.  no sound was heard with either of the two previous sightings.

i enjoy astronomy as a hobby and spend many evenings out with my telescope.  i can identify venus, jupiter, etc... (when they are visible) by sight.  i enjoy spotting meteors and have on several occasions spotted the iss as it orbits over.  i am also a civilian aviation and military enthusiast and am very familiar with the aircraft that regularly fly overhead.  i can tell the difference between a swa 737-300, c-130's flying out of the 179th in mansfield, the lifeflight based in avery and a fedex md-11 on approach to cle.  please believe me when i tell you this is not any of those, its something unusual.
content.summary: Solid, very bright red light that approaches and the disappears
